00004 /* The following structure is used in various subroutines to contain  */
00005 /* a number of run-time changeable parameters.                        */
00006 
00007 struct params {double dt;      /* The time step, in s.                */
00008                double dtbt;    /* The barotropic time step, in s.     */
00009                double be;   /* A nondimensional number from 0.5 to 1. */
00010                double bebt; /* A nondimensional number from 0 to 1.   */
00011                double daymax;  /* The final day of the simulation.    */
00012                double daysave; /* The first day to save output.       */
00013                double saveint; /* The number of days between saves.   */
00014                int saves_per_file; /* The number of time leves to     */
00015                                /* save to each file.                  */
00016                double energysavedays; /* The interval between writing */
00017                                /* the energies of the run.            */
00018                char energyfile[50];  /* The name of the energy file.  */
00019                char restartfile[50]; /* The name of the restart file. */
00020                double restint; /* The interval between saves of the   */
00021                                /* the restart file.                   */
00022                char inputdir[50]; /* The directory in which NetCDF    */
00023                                /* input files might be found.         */
00024                double Kh;      /* The Lapacian horizontal viscosity   */
00025                                /* in m2 s-1.                          */
00026                double Ah;      /* The biharmonic horizontal viscosity */
00027                                /* in m4 s-1.                          */
00028                double Kh_vel_scale; /* This velocity times the grid   */
00029                                /* spacing gives the Laplacian         */
00030                                /* viscosity, in m s-1.                */
00031                double Ah_vel_scale; /* This velocity times the grid   */
00032                                /* spacing cubed gives the biharmonic  */
00033                                /* viscosity, in m s-1.                */
00034                double Smag_Lap_const; /* The nondimensional Lapacian  */
00035                                /* Smagorinsky constant.               */
00036                double Smag_bi_const; /* The nondimensional biharmonic */
00037                                /* Smagorinsky constant.               */
00038                double Khth;    /* The interface depth diffusivity in  */
00039                                /* m2 s-1.                             */
00040                int iord;       /* The number of iterations of MPDATA. */
00041                int ntstep;     /* The number of time steps between    */
00042                                /* tracer updates or diabatic forcing. */
00043                double Hmix;    /* The mixed layer thickness in m.     */
00044                double Kvml;    /* The mixed layer vertical viscosity  */
00045                                /* in m2 s-1.                          */
00046                double Kdml;    /* The diapycnal diffusivity in the    */
00047                                /* mixed layer in m2 s-1.              */
00048                double Kv;      /* The vertical viscosity in m2 s-1.   */
00049                double Kd;      /* The diapycnal diffusivity in m2 s-1.*/
00050                double Hbbl;    /* The static bottom boundary layer    */
00051                                /* thickness, in m.                    */
00052                double Kvbbl;   /* The linear viscosity in the bottom  */
00053                                /* boundary layer, in m2 s-1.          */
00054                double cdrag;   /* The quadratic drag coefficient.     */
00055                double drag_bg_vel; /* An assumed unresolved background*/
00056                                /* velocity for calculating the bottom */
00057                                /* drag, in m s-1.                     */
00058                double BBL_thick_min; /* The minimum bottom boundary   */
00059                                /* layer thickness, in m.  This might  */
00060                                /* be Kv / (cdrag * drag_bg_vel) to    */
00061                                /* give Kv as the minimum near-bottom  */
00062                                /* viscosity.                          */
00063                double KhTr;    /* The along-isopycnal tracer          */
00064                                /* diffusivity in m2 s-1.              */
00065                double maxvel;  /* Velocity components greater than    */
00066                                /* maxvel, in m s-1, are truncated.    */
00067                int maxtrunc;   /* The number of truncations per time  */
00068                                /* step at which the run is stopped.   */
00069                int save_aves;  /* If defined (i.e. nonzero), time     */
00070                                /* averaging is enabled.               */
00071                double maxcpu;  /* The maximum amount of cpu time per  */
00072                                /* processor for which HIM should run  */
00073                                /* before saving a restart file and    */
00074                                /* quiting with a return value that    */
00075                                /* indicates that a further execution  */
00076                                /* is required to complete the simu-   */
00077                                /* lation, in wall-clock seconds.      */
00078               };
